data.eml:eml: Generic Synopsis of the Formicidae of Vietnam (Insecta: Hymenoptera), Part II—Cerapachyinae, Aenictinae, Dorylinae, Leptanillinae, Amblyoponinae, Ponerinae, Ectatomminae and Proceratiinae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eguchi, Katsuyuki, Viet, Bui Tuan, Yamane, Seiki (2014): Generic Synopsis of the Formicidae of Vietnam (Insecta: Hymenoptera), Part II—Cerapachyinae, Aenictinae, Dorylinae, Leptanillinae, Amblyoponinae, Ponerinae, Ectatomminae and Proceratiinae. Zootaxa 3860 (1): 1-46, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.1.1
